snippet: Peer-to-peer car-sharing services, which allow owners to rent vehicles directly to other drivers, scored some notable successes in 2011, as well as some embarrassing failures.
abstract: Peer-to-peer car-sharing services, which allow owners to rent vehicles directly to other drivers, scored some notable successes in 2011, as well as some embarrassing failures.

headline.main: JustShareIt Enters Suddenly Crowded, and Wary, Car-Sharing Market
